desc: We offer a wide range of replacement handsets, AC/DC power adaptors, telephone main and charging bases available for BT and Panasonic cordless phones. You can buy a spare handset, main base, charging base or a power supply adapter as replacement for your BT or Panasonic system.

layout.text: The specialist supplier of BT And Panasonic Telephone spare parts

We offer a wide range of replacement, professionally refurbished handsets, AC/DC power adaptors, telephone main and charging bases available for BT and Panasonic cordless telephones.

You can buy a spare handset, main base, charging base or a power supply adapter if you have lost or broken your BT or Panasonic phone handset, base, power adapter or to add an additional handset to your system.
